thread.title: ChaosMap Launches RepJuice Elite, Advanced Reputation Management For Financial Services Industry
thread.title_full: ChaosMap Launches RepJuice Elite, Advanced Reputation Management For Financial Services Industry

author: PRWEB
title: ChaosMap Launches RepJuice Elite, Advanced Reputation Management For Financial Services Industry
text:
Online reputation management can be a make or break proposition for a financial services firm - Jon Rognerud, Founder and CEO of Chaosmap Los Angeles, California (PRWEB) July 09, 2015
Chaosmap, a leading digital marketing and search engine optimization (SEO) agency, announced today that it has launched RepJuice Elite ( https://chaosmap.com/services/reputation-management/ ), an advanced reputation management offering for the financial services industry. As part of the program, Chaosmap is making itself available for a complimentary discovery reputation strategy session with interested parties.
“Online reputation management can be a make or break proposition for a financial services firm,” said Jon Rognerud, Founder and CEO of Chaosmap. “Positive online links and comments help you, but negative remarks that result in your brand being tarnished on the first page of Google can be deadly in such a trust-based business. That’s the problem we’re solving with this special program, we simply remove the negative mentions.”
The new product, RepJuice Elite, leverages proprietary techniques developed by Chaosmap to help mitigate the impact of reputation-damaging content online. The RepJuice Elite process uses advanced SEO strategies to bring the power across websites, blogs, authority sites, social media sites and media sites to re-position the client’s online brand. The company creates positive mentions for the client in Google search engine results. RepJuice Elite works by pushing negative mentions down in the search rankings, creating and lifting up positive ones, thereby suppressing detrimental brand mentions to the second page and beyond. “We do it faster than anybody else, and we have a comprehensive process in place from intake to delivery that includes education every step of the way,” Rognerud added.
Rognerud is a widely recognized authority on SEO and Internet technologies. His agency creates online marketing campaigns, provides advanced website development in WordPress and gets more sales opportunities for its clients. His marketing and development projects set new standards for how to run campaigns in real estate, health care, banking, legal and B2B marketing industries for both medium-sized businesses and large, global enterprises. He is the author of the popular “The Ultimate Guide to Search Engine Optimization” (Entrepreneur/Mcgraw-Hill), now in its 3rd edition, and “The Ultimate Guide to Optimizing Your Website.” Rognerud writes, blogs and is Quote: d in media such as Huffingtonpost, Entrepreneur Magazine, Yahoo Small Business, New York Times, USA Today, Social Media Examiner, and others.
For more information, visit https://chaosmap.com
